thread.title: Intel Faces Age-Discrimination Claims

author: Georgia Wells
title: Intel Faces Age-Discrimination Claims
text:
The federal watchdog for equal employment is investigating claims that Intel Corp. targeted workers for layoffs based on their age.
Nearly three years after the chip maker launched a series of layoffs that cut more than 10,000 employees globally, the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commissionâ€™s Seattle office is working to determine whether the job cuts were discriminatory, according to a document from the agency reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
...
